name: [Concept] Everything is Alive
description:
This was a concept for what I planned to be a much longer puzzle game. However, I discovered that much of the gameplay was too precision based to be fun as a puzzle game, so I decided to stop working on it earlier than planned. Despite only working on this for a few days, I did actually learn a lot about some aspects of Gamemaker that I had never used before.

Oh I also didn't remove debug stuff so press F1 to skip levels
